title: Baker’s Struggles, Year Two QB Panic, and Mahomes vs. Watson | The Ringer NFL Show
description:
We break down who's to blame for the Browns’ early-season struggles and how quickly QBs need to perform before it’s time to panic (2:30). Then we workshop some takes about trading Nick Foles and resting Patrick Mahomes (19:20); preview the biggest three games of the week, including Texans vs. Chiefs; and offer picks for the 'Thursday Night Football' game (30:50).
Hosts: Robert Mays, Kevin Clark

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
